examples: Torula colliculosa M. Hartmann, Wochenschr. Brau. 20: 113. 1903 (fungal name); Cercomonas parva M. Hartmann & C.R.J. Chagas, Mem. Inst. Oswaldo Cruz [Rio de Janeiro] 2: 67. 1910 (algal name).
